website_summaries.verdict: A versatile essential oil blend that works great on sore, tense muscles and migraine headaches.
pros: No fillers, additives, or carriers added
Soothing on tense muscles as well
Absorbs quickly and won't leave skin greasy
cons: Not everyone finds the scent pleasant
There have been complaints of the bottle leaking

customer_reviews.title: Love Tension Relief oil!
customer_reviews.text: My son had a lot of tension in his neck and shoulders after driving 8-9 hours with his little family for Christmas. I gave him my newly arrived bottle of Tension Relief to rub on before bed. He said he really slept well and didn't ache and took the bottle with him when they left to go home. The Plant Therapy Tension Relief defiantly did what we needed it for. We received it by mail so quickly, especially for Christmas mail. I defiantly will buy another bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle lover

customer_reviews.title: Calming, refreshing minty aroma
customer_reviews.text: Plant Therapy is my favorite EO brand because it's affordable yet great quality. Tension Relief is one of my favorite blends and one I've repurchased (I've also had it in the roll-on). It seems like most 'relaxing' EO blends include a heavy dose of lavender and I'm not a fan of lavender scent so I really like the fresh, minty smell here, it's so refreshing and yet calming at the same time. I love it when I get a headache too, it really helps. One of my favorites from this line!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for tension headaches
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Tension Relief because it was recommended to me as a help for my headaches. I get terrible tension headaches and nothing else seems to help them. I bought this, used coconut oil for a carrier oil, and I massage it into my neck when I start to get a headache. It always helps. I have tried just massaging my neck without this stuff and it doesn't do a thing. I like that with this I don't have to rely on medication all the time. I would recommend this and have done so several times. I would feel confident buying anything from Plant Therapy. They seem to have quality products.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Youngers

customer_reviews.title: Love this blend
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous blend. I diffuse it daily & it absolutely calms me down, especially after a stressful day. I have chronic migraine, and I have to say it has not helped my pain - but does help me relax during an attack. There is nothing at all negative to say about this essential oil blend, and I highly recommend you give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Driskill

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite
customer_reviews.text: First off, I really like Plant Therapy essential oils and have tried and used many different ones. I bought this one on a whim even though it didn't have many reviews and I have to say I really love it! It's not overpowering but it's not weak either. I use this in a diffuser and I don't get headaches so I don't really know if it works for that but it does help me relax after a long day.
customer_reviews.author: Ian C

customer_reviews.title: Great for stress relief
customer_reviews.text: I love this essential oil. I was looking for something to use with my cool mist diffuser to relieve stress and counteract my allergies and this worked perfectly. It's not too sweet like some blends, just the right amount of mint without being overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Kait

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product for tension headaches
customer_reviews.text: I get terrible tension knots in my back, shoulders and neck that cause headaches that will last for days. Typically, migraine medicine or massage is the only thing that helps. Once I feel the tension starting, I put some of this on it and it takes care of it. I am so, so thankful for this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Wisenor

customer_reviews.title: Really Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I get terrible headaches and as soon as I feel one coming on I rub this on my temples, base of my skull, and just inside my nostrils. I think inhaling the smell helps the most! I know it says to dilute it, but I don't just so you all know. This has been heaven sent! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Really works for my headaches, even those that come in the night!
customer_reviews.text: This product has made my life so much more stress free. Having had migraines and other headaches for so many years, I just cannot believe the results of this reliving my headaches now anywhere from 15 minutes to half an hour! Just wish I would have tried using oils years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Petals

customer_reviews.title: Love plant therapy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help with my migraines and it has been great. I have this in a roller bottle now and keep it by my bed. It is obviously not going to take away my migraines, but it definitely does help.
customer_reviews.author: Amethyst Bavaria

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am addicted to smells (oils, etc.) and I absolutely LOVE this one! I have been a little stressed working from home and in house with kids all day and THIS does the job!!! Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: MULTI-PURPOSE
customer_reviews.text: This EO blend is great on muscle spasms! I make a multipurpose pain salve that includes a generous quantity of tension relief. It's perfect for tight neck and shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Mushi's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Works well fr tension headache relief, especially if you catch it early
customer_reviews.text: I put this is a small roller bottle and kept it at my desk to use at work. It did a better job if I caught the head ache in the early stages.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Temple

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Scent
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and I like the blend. Of course these won't get rid of headaches, but they are relaxing and have a nice placebo effect. I get lots of compliments at my office when I use it as well, other others definitely like it too!
customer_reviews.author: The Golden Darter

customer_reviews.title: My favorite blend
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite Plant Therapy blend. I love it applied topically and I absolutely love it diffused 24/7. Thanks PT!
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite essential oils. It helps me with my headaches so much. I use it every night in my Diffuse.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Best topical product for tension related migraines I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I have reviewed this product before and once again can say, that I cannot live without this particular product. No other blend, that I have tried, works for my extreme muscle tension and associated migraines. Love it! My little miracle in a bottle. Seriously!
customer_reviews.author: Susan gaylor

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: This is soooo soothing!! I'll be purchasing this product AGAIN!! Thanks for making a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Best Customer 32806

customer_reviews.title: ... oil headache relief and this one has worked the best for me personally
customer_reviews.text: I have tried various blends and companies for essential oil headache relief and this one has worked the best for me personally! It smells good and does a great job with my headaches. I also have the roller version, which makes application really easy, and I can refill it with this and coconut oil as needed!
customer_reviews.author: Casie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice oil
customer_reviews.text: I use this oil in a diffuser and it is really relaxing. I use it to help with headaches and tension relief after work. It’s not a cure all but I would recommend it as a compliment to other stress relieving remedies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: which I did not like. I mixed one drop of this product with ...
customer_reviews.text: I get daily tension in my neck and shoulders that causes tension headaches. I was having to take Advil daily, which I did not like. I mixed one drop of this product with a quarter size amount of lotion, and rub on my neck and shoulders. It works almost instantly to dull the ache, and helps relax my muscles preventing me from getting a headache. I have not had to use Advil in the week since I have been using this product. It works amazingly for me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Really like this.
customer_reviews.text: Really liking this blend so far -- we use it in a nebulizing diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: It helps to diffuse it in a small room. Have been able to take an edge off my headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M Swenson

customer_reviews.title: Clean and refreshing, works for headaches
customer_reviews.text: This oil is great for topical use, like many others have said. When rubbed on my temples it significantly relieved my headache. When used in a diffuser it kind of smells like the health/beauty section of a health food store. Like every essential oil mixed together. That being said, it’s not an unpleasant scent. The peppermint and eucalyptus come through the strongest. A good clean and refreshing scent!
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this every night in my neck. Wouldn’t be able to sleep without it!
customer_reviews.author: BrittMae

customer_reviews.title: Favorite oil
customer_reviews.text: Best blend for nasal congestion & tension headaches. Favorite of all Plant Therapy essential oils. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mountainstar95

customer_reviews.title: Most prominent note was mint
customer_reviews.text: I liked this scent. Did notice the mint coming through stronger than most. Didn’t relieve my headache but was a nice, clean fragrance. Packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Atlantamom23

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing oil
customer_reviews.text: I like to sprinkle this on my sheets before I go to bed. Very relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Real Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Smell gives me a small headache
customer_reviews.text: I love plant therapy products, but this definitely is not a favorite of mine.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Ann

customer_reviews.title: Works great for headaches & congestion relief
customer_reviews.text: Best smelling and working essential oil for headache and congestion relief that I’ve tried
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Migraine Oil
customer_reviews.text: This blend has become my go to during my migraines! It definitely takes the edge off and helps me focus on something other than excruciating pain!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Wetsch

customer_reviews.title: Effective and high quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product primarily for my husband has he gets bad tension headaches. Before I was just using a lavender/peppermint mix. He enjoys this synergy a lot. There's something in it that isn't my favorite, but the effect is very positive even if I don't 100% enjoy the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyoftwincesses

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: This oil is super relaxing! I use this as aroma therapy by putting it in my diffuser at night. I have the most amazing sleep when I use this! My husband loves it, too, so we are definitely reordering this oil.
customer_reviews.author: Windi.G

customer_reviews.title: Great blend!
customer_reviews.text: Smells almost like a spa! Puts me right at ease!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: I really love this blend
customer_reviews.text: I really love this blend. I made a rollerball for my office, keep some in the car and some at home. It really seems to help and if nothing else I feel like I'm cutting down on my Aleve intake. I like this amazing blend better than just using peppermint, the synergy of the different oils really seems to work great. It's a keeper!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me. My headaches are just too bad for these natural products to work. I wish they did!!! It is me, I guess, not the product.
customer_reviews.author: ted bear

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my headaches
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my headaches. I diffuse it and use it in a small glass bottle with a coconut carrier oil to apply to the temples and back of neck.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Izanec

customer_reviews.title: Amazing in a hot bath
customer_reviews.text: A few drops of this in bath water and I am totally relaxed. I also have blended it with almond oil to massage into my temples and it works wonderfully each time I use it.
customer_reviews.author: lablady257

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing....
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this for a headache yet but I've been using it nightly with olive or coconut oil on my neck and shoulders and it really helps with tension. It has really helped me sleep better.
customer_reviews.author: Warriormom14

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells really good & is a god sent for my migraines.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Works really well for all my families headaches. Even ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for all my families headaches. Even made some up for friends that suffer from migrane headaches and it works well for them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Halbig

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product. Bought for a friend and really cuts ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Bought for a friend and really cuts the edge off his headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for TMJ Pain
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great for my TMJ. I apply it behind my ears, on my neck and jaw and it provides instant relief. A few drops in the shower is nice, too.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Nelson

customer_reviews.title: It makes everyine in the room sleepy.
customer_reviews.text: It makes everyine in the room sleepy. It gave me a headache the 1st night but after that it was comforting
customer_reviews.author: Crys

customer_reviews.title: I like this brand
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand. Great quality and nice blends. I love this one for use in my oil diffuser. It is effective and adds a calming essence to the air.
customer_reviews.author: LetsGoPens

customer_reviews.title: Great company. Very good oils for about half what ...
customer_reviews.text: Great company. Very good oils for about half what the two leaders in oils charge. This oil was helpful for a tension headache. It may not help much for a migraine, but people are different. This is worth a try for mild to moderate headache pain. Got product quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Gary A Meier

customer_reviews.title: shipping/packaging
customer_reviews.text: love the oils however one of them in order leaked everywhere....so I guess I am out that money. upside ..my mail box smells like peppermint
customer_reviews.author: j.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I just love Plant Therapy and the tension relief is amazing. Too bad it doesn't come in gallon size.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love EVERYTHING about this product- the value, the effects, the scent. I will definitely be purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a complete cure for a migraine but does help ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a complete cure for a migraine but does help to take the edge off substantial in a matter of minutes.
customer_reviews.author: C Diercks

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff!! It works well when I have sore or stiff muscles or aches and pains. The smell is pleasant too.
customer_reviews.author: Tandalyn

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a fantastic price!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for tension headaches. Love this company and all of their blends!
customer_reviews.author: Boomer Sooner

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love all Plant Therapy oils. I diffuse this one regularly
customer_reviews.author: wannabaudrey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product - use it often for sore shoulders and headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Love plant therapy oils
customer_reviews.text: Love plant therapy oils!!! I use them for my husband and i also use there kid friendly oils for our children! They have never disappointed. Very well priced as well!
customer_reviews.author: Emily K.

customer_reviews.title: she was feeling much better and the headache had significantly gone down
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works. I and my fiance both have headaches from time to time and sometimes they are severe. We are tired of using OTC medications and wanted to try something else. I found this and figured it was worth a shot. When I got it, my fiance was actually in the midst of a 2 day headache. I had her put some on and by that evening, she was feeling much better and the headache had significantly gone down. The next morning she was headache free. I was at first skeptical, but then about a week later I had a headache and so I put some of this oil on and I felt better by that afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: Lyman Rate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product works!! I apply it to the back of my neck and within minutes my headache is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smell like peppermint candy to me, it does work on relieving my headache and nausea
customer_reviews.author: Eureka75

customer_reviews.title: Not for migraines, but great scent.
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from migraines and bought it as something I can use to help with my headaches. I'm not expecting this to help get rid of my migraines but as a way to help me relax when I get one. I had a mild migraine and it didn't seem to make a difference with the pain, but I also get them really bad. However I love the smell and might try it when I feel the onset of one to see if it helps. I do have to say after buying it in Amazon I found it cheaper somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: TaurusVT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite new blends from Plant Therapy. A relaxing, yet cheerful mix.
customer_reviews.author: S. Koshy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for tense muscles on the back of your neck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It worked fast with a migraine headache that came on ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked fast with a migraine headache that came on quickly. I put it on the back of my neck and a dab under my nose which I should have mixed with my carrier oil but didn't think about it. I felt a little sick to my stomach for awhile but that passed along with my headache.
customer_reviews.author: elooto

customer_reviews.title: Haven't gotten to use this synergy yet. But I ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't gotten to use this synergy yet. But I am excited to try something more natural for all the headaches I get.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Perrin

customer_reviews.title: odd scent
customer_reviews.text: odd smell, not similar to other 'headache relief' oils, threw it out
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Plant Therapy Essential Oils......What a Joke!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the Tension Relief, Respir-Aid, Organic Frankincense and Relax Synergy essential oils. Biggest mistake ever! They smell so bad and they all smell the EXACT same! They smell like some cheap bathroom cleaner, it's so gross. My expectations weren't going to be too high, as I have spent plenty of money on essential oils in the past and all have been WONDERFUL. I wouldn't recommend Plant Therapy Essential Oils to anyone. What a scam! My goodness even if they're not high-quality oils, they could've at least gotten the scents right.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Love The Product, Trustworthy Company!
customer_reviews.text: First of all and of utmost importance, this essential oil blend passed the blot test with flying colors! I really like how it soothes the tense muscles of my shoulders and neck. I massage it into my temples, forehead and wrists when I feel a headache coming on. I dilute it with grapeseed or almond oil. I also appreciate the fact that this company can stand on their own, meaning they do not have page after page of high rated reviews (bogus IMO) from people who they offer free products to in exchange for their review. This blend is the bomb!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the small bottle of Plant Therapy Tension Relief and it was wonderful. This larger bottle of the same formula smells nothing like the small bottle. It's like bad aftershave. I probably won't purchase from this company again. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Woodland Wife

customer_reviews.title: Yep, it works!
customer_reviews.text: Smells so good and works even better! I love Plant Therapy! I have never been disappointed with any of their products. I have defused it, put it on straight, and made a roller bottle with carrier oil. Any way I've used it, it's worked beautifully!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Jones

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: While I can't vouch for it relieving headaches (as it did not mine but mine was a caffeine withdraw headache and not tension related) it smells wonderful and refreshing, especially in my diffuser. I did try putting some under my nose and with all the mint it did cause discomfort on my skin, so I'll just continue to only use it on my diffuser. I read other reviews that it was not strong enough, but mine was extremely strong so it definitely was not an issue with me!
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product quite a few times now and it is wonderful! Works like a charm for tension headaches - no medication needed. I really like the smell. Even used it with a migraine once and it seemed to take the edge off a bit until the meds kicked in. Much recommended product!
customer_reviews.author: mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Blessing
customer_reviews.text: This is a staple in my collection, I apply to neck for muscle tension and it works everytime. Thanks PT!
customer_reviews.author: Kris Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent
customer_reviews.text: Using this for my daughters who get frequent headaches. Mixed it with fractionated coconut oil and put in a roller bottle. Love the scent and it seems to work well for their headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Kas

customer_reviews.title: Good for mild headaches
customer_reviews.text: I like this at night when I have a mild headache. It feels cool when applied to the forehead which helps relax a tension headache.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. The scent is therapeutic and amazing. Very "spa" like, Last night I laid in a eucalyptus bath with this diffusing in the room and it was incredible. Seems to be a great quality oil.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Ok...
customer_reviews.text: These are ok. But I like doTERRA better. These are mostly half the cost. But the scent is half as good too. Plus I think doTERRA works way better.
customer_reviews.author: Choatson

customer_reviews.title: Godsend!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. I mixed it with a carrier oil and put it in a roller. I get bad tension headaches. I got one the other night and I put it on and it was practically gone within 10 min! Better than any medication I've tried!
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: i suffer from stress related migraines so this is a ...
customer_reviews.text: i suffer from stress related migraines so this is a God send. if I catch the headache in time it goes away with the oil instead of having to take serious medication while watching my 15 month old.
customer_reviews.author: forestjad

customer_reviews.title: will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful blend than truly does sooth some of my headaches. It doesn't really help my serious migraines but then again nothing really does, so I certainly don't fault this blend for that! I have even put it in my diffuser after cleaning my house just to make things smell great. I'm so happy I found this blend!

customer_reviews.title: Great blend to have on hand to relieve stress
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this blend and how quickly it works in relieving tension.

customer_reviews.title: Works great when applied to temples and back of neck with ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great when applied to temples and back of neck with a rollerball (6-7 drops in a 10ml container with carrier oil is the perfect recipe!). Has saved me from using a lot of otc pain meds.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great at bedtime!
customer_reviews.text: I mixed this with coconut oil and put it on my chest and arms every night before I go to sleep. It is soothing and calming. I have a problem with most scents, but this one doesn't bother me at all. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Great relief
customer_reviews.text: Makes my nose stuffy if I diffuse it for too long but it is very relieving!

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this! Use it as one of my go to daily divisions. Sometimes I add some extra umph with spearmint. Packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Valcourt

customer_reviews.title: This by far has been my favorite plant therapy blend
customer_reviews.text: This by far has been my favorite plant therapy blend. I not only use it in my defuser almost daily, but also as major relief for the headaches I have. Just a dab on my temples and at the base of my head... And within 5 mins I have relief. My go to choice for comfort..
customer_reviews.author: Jamie F.

customer_reviews.title: good for mild headaches
customer_reviews.text: These help for mild headaches. They're not exactly pain killers, but they do help slightly and smell good.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Helps with headaches and neck tension. I use in a roller bottle, and rub over head, base of skull and neck!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This smells fantastic in a diffuser and while it won't eliminate tension (ha!) it's a relaxing scent.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I get a lot of sinus headaches and this helps alleviate the problem. Love it.

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell
customer_reviews.text: My second Synergy oil purchased. I will purchase more. Love the smell.
customer_reviews.author: CDU

customer_reviews.title: This is one of my favorite go to blends!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blend! I am so glad that they renamed it tension relief because that is really what this is. When I am sitting at my desk working at the computer for hours, I have a tenancy to hunch my shoulders and when I get up I have a low dull headache and a cramp in my neck. If I diffuse this blend while working, I walk away relaxed and fully functional. I love it so much for both it's headache and tension relieving properties, that I carry a roller bottle of it with me all the time. I can't say enough good things.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: A strong blend that is helpful in relieving my tension headaches.

customer_reviews.title: It's not as intense/strong as Young Living's Deep Relief, ...
customer_reviews.text: It's not as intense/strong as Young Living's Deep Relief, but still helps with my daughter's migranes at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but wish it was magic
customer_reviews.text: Smells good, as expected, but does diddly squat to relieve a real headache or migraine. For those of use who really suffer, we're gonna need something better than this. I use it in my diffuser and it's nice for a pleasant background relaxing smell.
customer_reviews.author: MalibuStace

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil. I have a bracelet I put a few drops on it. When my coworkers or clients drive me crazy and give me a headache, I sit at my desk and smell my bracelet. Smells cool and minty.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Nickel

product_meta.title: Plant Therapy Tension Relief (Headache Relief) Synergy Essential Oil Blend. 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade. 10 ml (1/3 oz).
product_meta.description: Size:10 ml (1/3 Ounce)We all have demands that weigh us down; we are constantly battling with the stress and pressures from everyday life and because of that we often build up tension in the head and neck area. To help reduce this tension, Plant Therapy has created a 100% pure, undiluted essential oil synergy blend that includes Peppermint, Eucalyptus Globulus, Rosemary, Spearmint, Lavender, Basil linalool, Ravensara, Cinnamon Leaf, Ginger Root, and Roman Chamomile. This soothing, refreshing, and calming blend will help ease the tension away when used topically with a 3% dilution with your favorite gel, lotion, or carrier oil. Do not let the stress of life beat you down, use Tension Relief to find the "relief" you have been looking for from the tension build up!
feature_bullets: 100% PURE, UNDILUTED ESSENTIAL OIL SYNERGY: Contains the unique blend of pure essential oils that include Peppermint, Eucalyptus Globulus, Rosemary, Spearmint, Lavender, Basil linalool, Ravensara, Cinnamon Leaf, Ginger Root, and Roman Chamomile.
THE HIGHEST QUALITY: 100% Certified Pure Therapeutic Grade Essential Oil- no fillers, additives, bases or carriers added.
RELIEVE YOUR TENSION: Diffuse into the air to allow the sweet, soothing aroma ease your tensions away.
EASY TO USE: Mix into a gel, lotion, or your favorite Plant Therapy carrier oil using a 3% dilution ratio and massage gently into the temples and neck area.
HAVE QUESTIONS? Plant Therapy's certified aromatherapists are happy to help you with your Tension Relief Synergy Blend questions via Amazon Messages. We welcome your questions and input!
